title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 684.7 - Items lists
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 684.7 - Items lists

State Regulations

Lists of items appearing in the texts of the accounts or
elsewhere herein are for the purpose of more clearly indicating the application
of the prescribed accounting. The lists are intended to be representative, but
not exhaustive. The appearance of an item in a list warrants the inclusion of
the item in the account mentioned only when the text of the account also
indicates inclusion inasmuch as the same item frequently appears in more than
one list. The proper entry in each instance must be determined by the texts of
the accounts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
684.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
